00024 namespace json_spirit

00026     enum Value_type{ obj_type, 
00027                      array_type,
00028                      str_type,
00029                      bool_type,
00030                      int_type,
00031                      real_type,
00032                      null_type };
00033 
00034     template< class Config >    // Config determines whether the value uses std::string or std::wstring and
00035                                 // whether JSON Objects are represented as vectors or maps
00036     class Value_impl
00037     {
00038     public:
00039 
00040         typedef Config Config_type;
00041         typedef typename Config::String_type String_type;
00042         typedef typename Config::Object_type Object;
00043         typedef typename Config::Array_type Array;
00044         typedef typename String_type::const_pointer Const_str_ptr;  // eg const char*
00045 
00046         Value_impl();  // creates null value
00047         Value_impl( Const_str_ptr      value ); 
00048         Value_impl( const String_type& value );
00049         Value_impl( const Object&      value );
00050         Value_impl( const Array&       value );
00051         Value_impl( bool               value );
00052         Value_impl( int                value );
00053         Value_impl( boost::uint32_t    value );
00054         Value_impl( boost::int64_t     value );
00055         Value_impl( boost::uint64_t    value );
00056         Value_impl( double             value );
00057 
00058         Value_impl( const Value_impl& other );
00059 
00060         bool operator==( const Value_impl& lhs ) const;
00061 
00062         Value_impl& operator=( const Value_impl& lhs );
00063 
00064         Value_type type() const;
00065 
00066         bool is_uint64() const;
00067         bool is_null() const;
00068 
00069         const String_type& get_str()    const;
00070         const Object&      get_obj()    const;
00071         const Array&       get_array()  const;
00072         bool               get_bool()   const;
00073         int                get_int()    const;
00074         boost::uint32_t    get_uint32()  const;
00075         boost::int64_t     get_int64()  const;
00076         boost::uint64_t    get_uint64() const;
00077         double             get_real()   const;
00078 
00079         Object& get_obj();
00080         Array&  get_array();
00081 
00082         template< typename T > T get_value() const;  // example usage: int    i = value.get_value< int >();
00083                                                      // or             double d = value.get_value< double >();
00084 
00085         static const Value_impl null;
00086 
00087     private:
00088 
00089         void check_type( const Value_type vtype ) const;
00090 
00091         typedef boost::variant< String_type, 
00092                                 boost::recursive_wrapper< Object >, boost::recursive_wrapper< Array >, 
00093                                 bool, boost::int64_t, double > Variant;
00094 
00095         Value_type type_;
00096         Variant v_;
00097         bool is_uint64_;
00098     };
00099 
00100     // vector objects
00101 
00102     template< class Config >
00103     struct Pair_impl
00104     {
00105         typedef typename Config::String_type String_type;
00106         typedef typename Config::Value_type Value_type;
00107 
00108         Pair_impl( const String_type& name, const Value_type& value );
00109 
00110         bool operator==( const Pair_impl& lhs ) const;
00111 
00112         String_type name_;
00113         Value_type value_;
00114     };
00115 
00116     template< class String >
00117     struct Config_vector
00118     {
00119         typedef String String_type;
00120         typedef Value_impl< Config_vector > Value_type;
00121         typedef Pair_impl < Config_vector > Pair_type;
00122         typedef std::vector< Value_type > Array_type;
00123         typedef std::vector< Pair_type > Object_type;
00124 
00125         static Value_type& add( Object_type& obj, const String_type& name, const Value_type& value )
00126         {
00127             obj.push_back( Pair_type( name , value ) );
00128 
00129             return obj.back().value_;
00130         }
00131                 
00132         static String_type get_name( const Pair_type& pair )
00133         {
00134             return pair.name_;
00135         }
00136                 
00137         static Value_type get_value( const Pair_type& pair )
00138         {
00139             return pair.value_;
00140         }
00141     };

00146

00149     typedef Config::Object_type Object;
00150     typedef Config::Array_type  Array;

00164     // map objects
00165 
00166     template< class String >
00167     struct Config_map
00168     {
00169         typedef String String_type;
00170         typedef Value_impl< Config_map > Value_type;
00171         typedef std::vector< Value_type > Array_type;
00172         typedef std::map< String_type, Value_type > Object_type;
00173         typedef typename Object_type::value_type Pair_type;
00174 
00175         static Value_type& add( Object_type& obj, const String_type& name, const Value_type& value )
00176         {
00177             return obj[ name ] = value;
00178         }
00179                 
00180         static String_type get_name( const Pair_type& pair )
00181         {
00182             return pair.first;
00183         }
00184                 
00185         static Value_type get_value( const Pair_type& pair )
00186         {
00187             return pair.second;
00188         }
00189     };

00313     template< class Config >
00314     Value_impl< Config >& Value_impl< Config >::operator=( const Value_impl& lhs )
00315     {
00316         Value_impl tmp( lhs );
00317 
00318         std::swap( type_, tmp.type_ );
00319         std::swap( v_, tmp.v_ );
00320         std::swap( is_uint64_, tmp.is_uint64_ );
00321 
00322         return *this;
00323     }
00324 
00325     template< class Config >
00326     bool Value_impl< Config >::operator==( const Value_impl& lhs ) const
00327     {
00328         if( this == &lhs ) return true;
00329 
00330         if( type() != lhs.type() ) return false;
00331 
00332         return v_ == lhs.v_; 
00333     }

00335     template< class Config >
00336     Value_type Value_impl< Config >::type() const
00337     {
00338         return type_;
00339     }

00341     template< class Config >
00342     bool Value_impl< Config >::is_uint64() const
00343     {
00344         return is_uint64_;
00345     }
00346 
00347     template< class Config >
00348     bool Value_impl< Config >::is_null() const
00349     {
00350         return type() == null_type;
00351     }
00352 
00353     template< class Config >
00354     void Value_impl< Config >::check_type( const Value_type vtype ) const
00355     {
00356         if( type() != vtype ) 
00357         {
00358             std::ostringstream os;
00359 
00360             os << "value type is " << type() << " not " << vtype;
00361 
00362             throw std::runtime_error( os.str() );
00363         }
00364     }
00365 
00366     template< class Config >
00367     const typename Config::String_type& Value_impl< Config >::get_str() const
00368     {
00369         check_type(  str_type );
00370 
00371         return *boost::get< String_type >( &v_ );
00372     }

00430     template< class Config >
00431     double Value_impl< Config >::get_real() const
00432     {
00433         if( type() == int_type )
00434         {
00435             return is_uint64() ? static_cast< double >( get_uint64() )
00436                                : static_cast< double >( get_int64() );
00437         }
00438 
00439         check_type(  real_type );
00440 
00441         return boost::get< double >( v_ );
00442     }
00443

00447         check_type(  obj_type );

00449         return *boost::get< Object >( &v_ );
00450     }

00461     Pair_impl< Config >::Pair_impl( const String_type& name, const Value_type& value )
00462     :   name_( name )
00463     ,   value_( value )
00464     {
00465     }

00467     template< class Config >
00468     bool Pair_impl< Config >::operator==( const Pair_impl< Config >& lhs ) const
00469     {
00470         if( this == &lhs ) return true;
00471 
00472         return ( name_ == lhs.name_ ) && ( value_ == lhs.value_ );
00473     }
00474 
00475     // converts a C string, ie. 8 bit char array, to a string object
00476     //
00477     template < class String_type >
00478     String_type to_str( const char* c_str )
00479     {
00480         String_type result;
00481 
00482         for( const char* p = c_str; *p != 0; ++p )
00483         {
00484             result += *p;
00485         }
00486 
00487         return result;
00488     }

00492     namespace internal_
00493     {
00494         template< typename T >
00495         struct Type_to_type
00496         {
00497         };
00498 
00499         template< class Value > 
00500         int get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< int > )
00501         {
00502             return value.get_int();
00503         }
00504        
00505         template< class Value > 
00506         boost::uint32_t get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< boost::uint32_t > )
00507         {
00508             return value.get_uint32();
00509         }
00510 
00511         template< class Value > 
00512         boost::int64_t get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< boost::int64_t > )
00513         {
00514             return value.get_int64();
00515         }
00516        
00517         template< class Value > 
00518         boost::uint64_t get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< boost::uint64_t > )
00519         {
00520             return value.get_uint64();
00521         }
00522        
00523         template< class Value > 
00524         double get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< double > )
00525         {
00526             return value.get_real();
00527         }
00528        
00529         template< class Value > 
00530         typename Value::String_type get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< typename Value::String_type > )
00531         {
00532             return value.get_str();
00533         }
00534        
00535         template< class Value > 
00536         typename Value::Array get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< typename Value::Array > )
00537         {
00538             return value.get_array();
00539         }
00540        
00541         template< class Value > 
00542         typename Value::Object get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< typename Value::Object > )
00543         {
00544             return value.get_obj();
00545         }
00546        
00547         template< class Value > 
00548         bool get_value( const Value& value, Type_to_type< bool > )
00549         {
00550             return value.get_bool();
00551         }
00552     }
00553 
00554     template< class Config >
00555     template< typename T > 
00556     T Value_impl< Config >::get_value() const
00557     {
00558         return internal_::get_value( *this, internal_::Type_to_type< T >() );
00559     }
